snippet: Sports management degrees are popular, and graduate schools are offering an increasing number of programs for midcareer students.
abstract: Students young and older are flocking to sports management programs, lured by the glamour of sports or prompted by a mid-career desire to put existing skills to work in a new field; many universities, eager to develop new moneymaking ventures, are happy to accommodate them.
lead_paragraph: Sports management degrees are popular, and graduate schools are offering an increasing number of programs for midcareer students.
